data.text: Diili ʋoomaiti ta ɗa gulɔ maku nɛɛnɛgi ɠoloɠolo, é vɛɛlo.
Ɠima nui ɠigi ɠa ɗa lo tuɠɔ ga pagɔ,
Ɠimalala nui ziɛ ʋelei ɠa ɗa dɛ pele zaamaʋɛ ga é la faa ɠaaɠaazu,
Ni ɗa-ɠundiɠii yiiɠaa a wanana è ma, mina zeɠe è-losuʋɛ,
Gè faa ɲɔi ta ɠaaʋɛ, é ɗa ɠɛ zooi ɠa, é ga kundiɠiiti sɔgi.
Naa ɠa é ga: Ɠimalala nuiti ta ɗa tosu wolaiti sɔlɔɔ, zɔiti mu ti ga kpɛtɛ nuiti, naati ti ɗa yɛ tosu goiti su.
Gè duɔi tanigaa ɠaa zeini sooiti kɔma, masa dointi ti ɗa ziɛ ɠɔɠɔa ga duɔiti kɛʋele.
Zɔi é zeɠei wɔɔzu, toɠa zoo tɔ ɓɔɠɔi é loo su.
Kɔtui ɠula nui ɠa zoo ɓɔɠɔ maawanazu ga ta,
Kɔlui ɠaa a zaana, nui nii é botii ɠɛɛzu la, ni é la gaalini, kɛni é boti ɠɛ ga zɛbɛi pɛ,
È zoo pa ɠaɠosu ga kaalii, ni ɗa tɔɔzeina ga kaalii è ɲi,
Ɠima nui a ɓɔɛna, gooi ɠa ɗa nuiti ɛnɛkɛ,
Toɠa ɗa woo lɔɔzei ga ɠimalala ɓɔɛiti,
É la ɠwɛ kwɛni kpɔɛzuɠulai ʋa.
Ɠimalala nui ná-botii ɠa ɗa suziɠa,
Maanɔɠɔi ɠa zooi naa ʋɛ, nii ná-masagi ga doungoi,
Undaanɛɛ ɠa naama yooi ʋɛ, nii ná-masagi ga seizumaanɛ suwuzui,
Nui nii ɲaka yeeiti ti ba, dakai ɠa ɗa ɠolo ma,
Nu ɠa ɠɔnɔgi ɓɛtɛzu ga é è yiilɛi,
Mina masagi ɠoto anɛɛ è-yiimaʋɛ,
